topic.title: Adding Libraries to the Built-in FO Processor (DITA-OT)

body.p: To use additional libraries with the DITA-OT publishing engine, you need to edit the transformation scenario and add the path to the new libraries in the Libraries section of the Advanced tab.

section.title: Adding Hyphenation Support for DITA-OT Transformation Scenarios

ol.li: Download the pre-compiled JAR from OFFO.
Edit the DITA-OT transformation scenario and switch to the Advanced tab. Click the Libraries button and add the path to the fop-hyph.jar library.
Edit the DITA-OT transformation scenario and switch to the Advanced tab. Click the Libraries button and add the path to the libraries.
